mapper.select: select * from (select @no := @no + 1 as rownum, A.* from (select * from board order by seq DESC order by seq ASC order by seq DESC ) A, (select @no := 0) B) C where C.rownum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from board where subject like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') || contents like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select * from ( select @no := @no + 1 as rownum, A.* from (select * from board order by seq DESC) A,(select @no := 0 ) B ) C where C.rownum>= #{startRow} and C.rownum <= #{endRow} and subject like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') || contents like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by board_enrolldate desc;
select count(*) from board where subject like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select * from ( select @no := @no + 1 as rownum, A.* from (select* from board order by seq DESC) A,(select @no := 0 ) B ) C where C.rownum >= #{startRow} and C.rownum<= #{endRow} and subject like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by board_enrolldate desc;
select count(*) from board where contents like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select * from ( select @no := @no + 1 as rownum, A. seq, subject, contents, board_enrolldate from (select* from board ) A,(select @no := 0 ) B ) C where C.rownum >= #{startRow} and C.rownum<= #{endRow} and contents like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by board_enrolldate desc;
mapper.update: update board set subject = #{subject}, contents = #{contents} where seq = #{seq}
